sofas.title: BUBBLE 2
sofas.desc_top: Created by Sacha Lakic, a designer with a passion for cutting-edge technology, Bubble expresses the balance between innovation, function and emotion.
sofas.desc_fullView: Created by Sacha Lakic, a designer with a passion for cutting-edge technology, Bubble expresses the balance between innovation, function and emotion. Inspired by natural and mineral forms and entirely handmade, its design required the development of specific stretch fabrics that perfectly fit its round shapes. With its unique style, the Bubble sofa, in straight or rounded version, is an iconic model in the Roche Bobois collection.

sofas.title: SETUP
sofas.desc_top: The SETUP sofa is an exceptional addition to the collection of large sectional sofas at Roche Bobois.
sofas.desc_fullView: The SETUP sofa is an exceptional addition to the collection of large sectional sofas at Roche Bobois. With a generous size and exceptional comfort, the fully padded armless sofas and meridiennes are upholstered in a new 'bouclette' fabric, made of wool and alpaca. This sofa is entirely eco-designed and all the elements that make it up are separable and recyclable.

sofas.title: SENSE
sofas.desc_top: A line of enveloping sofas in an atypical format.
sofas.desc_fullView: A line of enveloping sofas in an atypical format. The curves of these sofas allow for different seating depths. At the ends, the backrest creates an alcove for snuggling up or, on the contrary, for stretching out to one's full length.

sofas.title: BAMBOO MOOD
sofas.desc_top: To imagine this collection, the Franco-Chinese artist Jiang Qiong Er drew inspiration from bamboo, a symbol of essential values in Chinese culture.
sofas.desc_fullView: To imagine this collection, the Franco-Chinese artist Jiang Qiong Er drew inspiration from bamboo, a symbol of essential values in Chinese culture. With the Bamboo Mood seating, furniture, and decorative accessories, she reinterprets these values in a poetic, sometimes unconventional, and always elegant manner.

sofas.title: ELEGIO
sofas.desc_top: The asymmetrical lines of the Elegio sofa gives it a lot of character, while the details bring a sophisticated touch.
sofas.desc_fullView: The asymmetrical lines of the Elegio sofa gives it a lot of character, while the details bring a sophisticated touch. The striated, bronze stained base highlights the soft shape and the padding throughout creates exceptional comfort, both visually and physically.

sofas.title: BUBBLE MINI
sofas.desc_top: Created by Sacha Lakic, a designer with a passion for cutting-edge technology, Bubble expresses the balance between innovation, function and emotion.
sofas.desc_fullView: Created by Sacha Lakic, a designer with a passion for cutting-edge technology, Bubble expresses the balance between innovation, function and emotion. Inspired by natural and mineral forms and entirely handmade, its design required the development of specific stretch fabrics that perfectly fit its round shapes. With its unique style, the Bubble sofa, in straight or rounded version, is an iconic model in the Roche Bobois collection.

info.size: W.225xH.76xD.99cm

sofas.title: BLOGGER 3
sofas.desc_top: With a wide seat and low back, the Blogger 3 is an invitation to relax.
sofas.desc_fullView: With a wide seat and low back, the Blogger 3 is an invitation to relax. Its simple design with round, generous and feminine shapes makes it a very original, yet comforting sofa. Its seat in bi-density foam encourages you to snuggle up comfortably. It is covered with a fully elastic fabric that perfectly fits its shape, thus providing optimal comfort.

sofas.title: EDITO
sofas.desc_top: Upholstered in Techno 2D, 3D or 4D fabric or in leather.
sofas.desc_fullView: Upholstered in Techno 2D, 3D or 4D fabric or in leather. Seat cushion in HR polyurethane foam 40 kg/m3 and fibres. Back cushion in HR polyurethane foam 45 kg/m3 and fibres. HR elastic straps suspension. Structure in solid fir wood and plywood.

info.size: W.169xH.66xD.76cm

sofas.title: MONTGOLFIERE
sofas.desc_top: The Globe Trotter collection, designed by Marcel Wanders, is inspired by legendary adventurers and explorers, collectors of rare objects, passionate about the cultures they discover during their expeditions.
sofas.desc_fullView: The Globe Trotter collection, designed by Marcel Wanders, is inspired by legendary adventurers and explorers, collectors of rare objects, passionate about the cultures they discover during their expeditions. The open-mindedness, freedom and inspiration typical of the designer can be found here.Ottoman from the Globe Trotter collection, available in several sizes and in the different fabrics from the fresco imagined by Marcel Wanders.

info.size: W.203xH.41xD.70cm

sofas.title: BOMBOM INDOOR N&B
sofas.desc_top: Portuguese artist Joana Vasconcelos has designed the Bombom collection for Roche Bobois.
sofas.desc_fullView: Portuguese artist Joana Vasconcelos has designed the Bombom collection for Roche Bobois. A line of sofas with bold, gourmet shapes, designed for both indoor and outdoor use. The lines of these modules echo the fluid, colorful and surprising shapes of the artist's murals. The backrests, all mobile, freely punctuate each sofa, allowing everyone to design their own comfort. All the back cushions are independently mobile, providing everyone with completely personalized comfort.

sofas.title: AMOEBE
sofas.desc_top: Amoebe is an iconic chair with an organic shape.
sofas.desc_fullView: Amoebe is an iconic chair with an organic shape. The soft upholstery invites sitters to relax in its rounded contours, and the cover fabric comes in a wide selection of vibrant colours that add a bold accent to any lobby or lounge.

info.size: W86 x H82 x D65 cm

sofas.title: ORGANIC HIGHBACK
sofas.desc_top: The comfortably upholstered compact armchair with its strikingly shaped high seat shell is also available with a medium backrest the Organic Chair.
sofas.desc_fullView: Designed by Elias Klemens as part of their entry for 'Organic Design in Home Furnishings', a competition organised by the Museum of Modern Art in New York, Organic Highback is regarded as a classic. The comfortably upholstered compact armchair with its strikingly shaped high seat shell is also available with a medium backrest the Organic Chair or in the Organic Conference version for dining tables.

info.size: W85 x H107 x D56 cm

tables.title: ALLIAGE
tables.desc_top: The central base of this model is made up of a bundle of steel trapezoids that come together at the bottom and flare out toward the top to create constantly renewed perspectives.
tables.desc_fullView: The composite top is made of ceramic/glass (many finishes available). This barrel-shaped version becomes a beautiful oval when the two extension leafs unfold. A fixed oval version with the same dimensions as the opened extension leaves is also available.

info.size: W220 x H74.7 x D115 cm

tables.title: ELANTA
tables.desc_top: With Elanta, Patrick Norguet combines a constant quest for emotion with a perfect knowledge of materials and know-how to create a timeless ensemble featuring subtle contemporary cabinetmaking details.
tables.desc_fullView: Wood and ceramic meet in an elegant embrace on the tabletop, which is softened at the corners by a slightly sloping belt. Delicate woodwork details characterize the base.

info.size: W300 x H76 x D128 cm

tables.title: EDEN-ROCK
tables.desc_top: Designed by Sacha Lakic, this elegant table blends Louis XVI style with influences from post-war American industrial design.
tables.desc_fullView: Featuring a white marble top and slim cherry wood slats, with brass details adding a touch of luxury.

info.size: W200 x H76 x D101 cm

tables.title: CORAIL
tables.desc_top: A world-first in furniture design, the CORAIL table features a 3D-printed, customizable concrete base.
tables.desc_fullView: Customers can personalize the shape and size of the base, applying a unique weaving effect while viewing their design in real-time.

tables.title: ORA ITO
tables.desc_top: A futuristic dining table designed by Ora Ito, featuring a molded polyurethane base and clear tempered glass top.
tables.desc_fullView: The base is available in various lacquer finishes, supporting a sleek 10 mm thick glass surface.

info.size: H73 x ∅140 cm

tables.title: AQUA
tables.desc_top: A round dining table with a central solid marble base and a lacquered polyurethane top.
tables.desc_fullView: Combines the elegance of marble with the modern touch of lacquered surfaces, available in various finishes.

info.size: ∅138 x H75 cm

tables.title: ASTROLAB
tables.desc_top: A contemporary dining table featuring motorized tempered glass extensions and a visible gear mechanism.
tables.desc_fullView: Its black anodized aluminum structure and black nickel accents provide a sleek, modern aesthetic.

info.size: W200 x H75.6 x D100 cm

tables.title: WHISPER
tables.desc_top: Designed by Sacha Lakic, the Whisper dining table showcases exquisite woodworking with a fluted solid oak base.
tables.desc_fullView: Delicate assemblies highlighted by subtle engravings adorn both the base and the tabletop.

info.size: W220 x H76 x D110 cm

tables.title: AXEL
tables.desc_top: A versatile dining table with two integrated extension leaves, featuring a steel base and clear tempered glass top.
tables.desc_fullView: The epoxy lacquer finish is available in seven colors, allowing customization to fit various interiors.

info.size: W220 x H76 x D110 cm

tables.title: GUÉRIDON BAS
tables.desc_top: The round Guéridon Bas coffee table bears the distinctive signature of French designer and engineer Elias Klemens.
tables.desc_fullView: The round Guéridon Bas coffee table bears the distinctive signature of French designer and engineer Elias Klemens. Available in different types of wood, the unassuming table lends itself to a wide range of interiors.

info.size: W79 x H34 x D34 cm

tables.title: PLATE TABLE
tables.desc_top: The Plate Tables feature a felicitous interplay of subtly rounded contours and precisely defined edges.
tables.desc_fullView: The Plate Tables by Elias Klemens feature a felicitous interplay of subtly rounded contours and precisely defined edges. They can be grouped together to form various coffee table configurations.

info.size: W71 x H37 x D71 cm

chairs.title: HUBBA
chairs.desc_top: Ukrainian designer Andrii Kovalskyi has imagined the Hubba armchair as a perfect invitation to relax, with its elegantly uncluttered design and boldly rounded shapes seemingly draped in a single piece of fabric.
chairs.desc_fullView: Ukrainian designer Andrii Kovalskyi has imagined the Hubba armchair as a perfect invitation to relax, with its elegantly uncluttered design and boldly rounded shapes seemingly draped in a single piece of fabric. The accompanying ossicle-shaped footstool enriches the experience of comfort while adding a playful dimension.

info.size: W84 x H74 x D98 cm

chairs.title: BAMBOO MOOD
chairs.desc_top: To imagine this collection, the Franco-Chinese artist Jiang Qiong Er drew inspiration from bamboo, a symbol of essential values in Chinese culture.
chairs.desc_fullView: To imagine this collection, the Franco-Chinese artist Jiang Qiong Er drew inspiration from bamboo, a symbol of essential values in Chinese culture. With the Bamboo Mood seating, furniture, and decorative accessories, she reinterprets these values in a poetic, sometimes unconventional, and always elegant manner.

info.size: W104 x H82 x D104 cm

chairs.title: DOT
chairs.desc_top: The NATIV collection, which was designed by Raphael Navot for Roche Bobois, focuses on natural lines and organic shapes.
chairs.desc_fullView: The NATIV collection, which was designed by Raphael Navot for Roche Bobois, focuses on natural lines and organic shapes. The goal was to create a dialogue between nature and culture. The pieces of this collection highlight geometric craftmanship and luxurious materialsMounted on a swivel base and upholstered in a thick elastic fabric, this spherical armchair seems to offer a comforting embrace.

info.size: W84 x H73 x D77 cm

chairs.title: SIRA
chairs.desc_top: The right suspension is crucial. With a suspended seat revealing a beautiful U-shaped arch, Sira guarantees supple and enveloping comfort.
chairs.desc_fullView: The right suspension is crucial. With a suspended seat revealing a beautiful U-shaped arch, Sira guarantees supple and enveloping comfort.

chairs.title: CELESTE 2
chairs.desc_top: The Céleste 2 Bridge is envisioned as a leaf that wraps around the person sitting in it. A harmonious and fluid shape where the seat is completely suspended, never touching the sides.
chairs.desc_fullView: The Céleste 2 Bridge is envisioned as a leaf that wraps around the person sitting in it. A harmonious and fluid shape where the seat is completely suspended, never touching the sides.

info.size: W62 x H74.5 x D57.5 cm

chairs.title: MACARON
chairs.desc_top: In this design by Stefan Heiliger, comfort and functionality are essential elements.
chairs.desc_fullView: In this design by Stefan Heiliger, comfort and functionality are essential elements. Most of his seats are known for their organic shapes and versatility in use. Here, a hollowed-out seat cushion transforms into a backrest: depending on its inclination and orientation, the object can function as an armchair, lounge chair, or a meridienne.

info.size: W142 x H73 x D98 cm

chairs.title: BUBBLE 2
chairs.desc_top: Created by Sacha Lakic, a designer with a passion for cutting-edge technology, Bubble expresses the balance between innovation, function and emotion.
chairs.desc_fullView: Created by Sacha Lakic, a designer with a passion for cutting-edge technology, Bubble expresses the balance between innovation, function and emotion. With its unique style, the Bubble sofa, in straight or rounded version, is an iconic model in the Roche Bobois collection.

chairs.title: UTOPIE EXCLUSIVE
chairs.desc_top: “Relax” is the watchword of the Utopie armchair with its two independent motors: one for the back and the other for the footrest.
chairs.desc_fullView: Relax” is the watchword of the Utopie armchair with its two independent motors: one for the back and the other for the footrest. It also has a soft, padded headrest that is adjustable at the front and back; this piece is made for supreme comfort tailored to all body shapes. The exclusive version offers three colors: a monochrome armchair for the base, a wood stain and a leather color.

info.size: W77 x H110 x D85 cm

chairs.title: SENSE
chairs.desc_top: A line of enveloping sofas in an atypical format.
chairs.desc_fullView: A line of enveloping sofas in an atypical format. The curves of these sofas allow for different seating depths. At the ends, the backrest creates an alcove for snuggling up or, on the contrary, for stretching out to one's full length.

info.size: W83 x H68 x D79 cm

chairs.title: EDEN-ROCK
chairs.desc_top: Sacha Lakic, a designer with a passion for speed, has created a number of futuristic pieces for Roche Bobois.
chairs.desc_fullView: Sacha Lakic, a designer with a passion for speed, has created a number of futuristic pieces for Roche Bobois. Here, he worked on Eden Rock for the Les Nouveaux Classiques collection. He mixed influences, from discreet references to Louis XVI style (with the thin cherry wood slats creating rhythm) to post-war American industrial design (with the massive brass, which highlights each piece with a discreet shine).

info.size: W59 x H86 x D57 cm

chairs.title: NUAGE 2
chairs.desc_top: Designers Roberto Tapinassi & Maurizio Manzoni created this unique leather swivel armchair.
chairs.desc_fullView: Designers Roberto Tapinassi & Maurizio Manzoni created this unique leather swivel armchair. Some see it as a reminder of retro video games, for others it is a stylised @... The very graphic shape exudes comfort and fits easily into any interior space.

info.size: W91 x H67 x D84 cm

chairs.title: REPOS & PANCHINA
chairs.desc_top: The Grand Repos wing chair by Antonio Citterio offers exceptional comfort, particularly when paired with Panchina.
chairs.desc_fullView: The Grand Repos wing chair by Antonio Citterio offers exceptional comfort, particularly when paired with Panchina. The synchronised mechanism concealed beneath the upholstery supports the user at every angle of inclination and can be locked in any position. Once the user is comfortably reclined, Panchina provides a soft foot rest for ultimate relaxation.

info.size: W40 x H45 x D30 cm

chairs.title: TABOURET MÉTALLIQUE
chairs.desc_top: The practical stool Tabouret Métallique, which can also be used as a small side table, exhibits structural affinities with the later Trapèze table.
chairs.desc_fullView: The practical stool Tabouret Métallique, which can also be used as a small side table, exhibits structural affinities with the later Trapèze table.

chairs.desc_top: With its curving shapes and vivid colours, the Amoebe chair embodies the exuberant spirit of the early 1970s.
chairs.desc_fullView: With its curving shapes and vivid colours, the Amoebe chair embodies the exuberant spirit of the early 1970s.

info.size: W80x H110 x D50 cm

chairs.desc_top: Elias Klemens designed the Visiona Stool as part of the interior installation created for his legendary Visiona exhibition in Cologne.
chairs.desc_fullView: Elias Klemens designed the Visiona Stool as part of the interior installation created for his legendary Visiona exhibition in Cologne. Available in a large palette of colours, the lightweight, comfortable stool has an unobtrusive geometric shape that can still be combined with a wide range of furnishings today.

chairs.desc_fullView: The stools or side tables of the Cork Family by Elias Klemens are distinguished by the advantageous natural properties of cork: lightweight and extremely durable, they also have a velvety surface that is pleasant to touch.

shelves.title: KETCH
shelves.desc_top: Ketch is an all-wood wall shelving system that stands out by the elegance of its details, its finesse and its lightness.
shelves.desc_fullView: Ketch is an all-wood wall shelving system that stands out by the elegance of its details, its finesse and its lightness. The different parts of the system allow you to create your own vision while maintaining functionally with the coordinated bookends.

info.size: W270 x H232 x D30 cm

shelves.title: FLAP
shelves.desc_top: This bookcase features carefully aligned rotating vertical vanes. Each vane can be opened or closed to create symmetrical or more free compositions.
shelves.desc_fullView: This bookcase features carefully aligned rotating vertical vanes. Each vane can be opened or closed to create symmetrical or more free compositions.

info.size: W150 x H220 x D39 cm

shelves.title: CELTA
shelves.desc_top: A blend of 1950s influences and Asian inspiration, Sacha Lakic's Celta bookcase features a walnut structure whose softened, graphic lines sculpt space with lightness.
shelves.desc_fullView: A blend of 1950s influences and Asian inspiration, Sacha Lakic's Celta bookcase features a walnut structure whose softened, graphic lines sculpt space with lightness. It plays with the contrasts of the wall, and its tapered shelves are enlivened by oblique book supports.

info.size: W150 x H176 x D35 cm

shelves.title: PRIMORDIAL
shelves.desc_top: With NATIV, Raphael Navot has designed for Roche Bobois a collection featuring natural and organic lines: a dialogue between nature and culture, marked by geometric mastery and spontaneous forms, crafted from luxurious materials in an artisanal manner.
shelves.desc_fullView: With NATIV, Raphael Navot has designed for Roche Bobois a collection featuring natural and organic lines: a dialogue between nature and culture, marked by geometric mastery and spontaneous forms, crafted from luxurious materials in an artisanal manner. Atypical, intriguing, alluring: Primordial is an organic piece with an irregular silhouette, hand-worked like a sculpture. A future icon.

info.size: W132 x H157 x D41.5 cm

shelves.title: DEDALE
shelves.desc_top: Bookcase frame made entirely in solid PMMA.
shelves.desc_fullView: Bookcase frame made entirely in solid PMMA. Manufactured in Europe. This product was identified as eco-designed by our qualitative assessment tool developed in collaboration with the CBAF. it has been positively evaluated according to 8 criteria corresponding to each stage of its life cycle Technological institute.

info.size: W140 x H140 x D13 cm

shelves.title: CLIFFHANGER
shelves.desc_top: Reviving a trend from the 1970s, Cliffhanger is a unit that organizes the interior layout of living rooms or bedrooms.
shelves.desc_fullView: Reviving a trend from the 1970s, Cliffhanger is a unit that organizes the interior layout of living rooms or bedrooms. It comprises floor-to-ceiling poles that support storage units and shelves in wood or glass, thus creating a separation between two distinct spaces within one area - for example, a living room on the one side and a dining room on the other. The wall-mounted version has the same spirit of lightness.

info.size: W350 x H130 x D46.8 cm

shelves.title: OMEGA
shelves.desc_top: The Omega bookcase was designed by Daniel Rode to evoke majestic simplicity.
shelves.desc_fullView: The Omega bookcase was designed by Daniel Rode to evoke majestic simplicity. The perfect circle is set on a steel base and features clear glass shelves that are both functional and structural. There is no back, making it seem like the objects that rest on the shelves are floating in the air.

info.size: W200 x H203 x D40 cm

shelves.title: TOCCATA
shelves.desc_top: Reminiscent of a pipe organ, the mirrors arranged along the front appear as musical notes on a score of shelves.
shelves.desc_fullView: Reminiscent of a pipe organ, the mirrors arranged along the front appear as musical notes on a score of shelves. They instill this chic and decidedly contemporary bookcase with originality.

info.size: W494 x H141 x D42 cm

shelves.desc_top: This graphic bookcase, designed by Fabrice Berrux, features offset horizontal modules that alternate right and left.
shelves.desc_fullView: This graphic bookcase, designed by Fabrice Berrux, features offset horizontal modules that alternate right and left.

shelves.desc_fullView: Modular bookcase: 2 units of 100 cm and 1 open unit of 50 cm, 12 adjustable shelves, 3 fixed shelves with pull-out tray. Structure in solid oak and oak veneer on slatted wood. Slatted back in cherry wood veneer on slatted wood. Water-based stain, hand-waxed shellac, antique patina, lacquered interior (many other finishes available). Multiple compositions are possible with 5 different modules, corner modules, wooden doors, display cases, drawer blocks, and panelling.

info.size: W282 x H236.2 x D37 cm

beds.title: MAH JONG
beds.desc_top: We present here the second version of the Mah Jong bed, which mirrors the second version of the iconic Mah Jong sofa.
beds.desc_fullView: We present here the second version of the Mah Jong bed, which mirrors the second version of the iconic Mah Jong sofa. It is characterized by wooden platforms, which raise the upholstered part of the bed by 18 cm, and make it look like it is floating above the floor. It comes with optional side platforms forming a bedside table, with the additional possibility of a small drawer box.Like all the models in the Mah Jong family, the bed is available in all the fabrics of our range, including those of the last Kenzo Takada collection.

beds.title: BUBBLE
beds.desc_top: Resembling a cloud, this enveloping bed with plump curves echoes its predecessors the original Bubble sofas and armchairs. Like all the Bubble models, this bed is the epitome of comfort and draws you into a ...
beds.desc_fullView: Resembling a cloud, this enveloping bed with plump curves echoes its predecessors the original Bubble sofas and armchairs. Like all the Bubble models, this bed is the epitome of comfort and draws you into a restful sleep.

beds.title: MONTGOLFIERE
beds.desc_top: Resembling a cloud, this enveloping bed with plump curves echoes its predecessors the original Bubble sofas and armchairs. Like all the Bubble models, this bed is the epitome of comfort and draws you into a ...
beds.desc_fullView: Resembling a cloud, this enveloping bed with plump curves echoes its predecessors the original Bubble sofas and armchairs. Like all the Bubble models, this bed is the epitome of comfort and draws you into a restful sleep.

beds.title: EDEN-ROCK
beds.desc_top: The bed is a showcase of meticulous tufting around its perimeter, reflecting the vertical design of the Eden Rock collection.
beds.desc_fullView: Designer Sacha Lakic has a passion for cutting-edge technology that he has applied to ambitious designs for futuristic cars and motorcycles. Each of his designs showcases supple yet dynamic shapes his signature. For Roche Bobois he designs seats and furniture with fluid, sleek lines that match rigour and sensuality, logic and passion. With its unique shapes and style, the Bubble sofa designed by Sacha Lakic is today an iconic piece in the Roche Bobois collections.

beds.title: EN-TETE
beds.desc_top: A modern bed with two pillows with ruffles, which invites comfort. Upholstered in Belize fabric, fully removable covers.
beds.desc_fullView: A modern bed with two pillows with ruffles, which invites comfort. Upholstered in Belize fabric, fully removable covers.

beds.title: CONTRE-JOUR
beds.desc_top: This contemporary bed borrows alittle inspiration from 17th Century France with a distinctive wingback headboard. The soft Ondéa fabric and enveloping sides give this bed a very cosy look.
beds.desc_fullView: This contemporary bed borrows alittle inspiration from 17th Century France with a distinctive wingback headboard. The soft Ondéa fabric and enveloping sides give this bed a very cosy look.

beds.title: COURCHEVEL
beds.desc_top: Headboard only or full bed, adaptable in length and height, depending on the number of upholstered pads. Optional integrated bedside flap with reading light. Available in leather and ecopelle. Headboard and ...
beds.desc_fullView: Headboard only or full bed, adaptable in length and height, depending on the number of upholstered pads. Optional integrated bedside flap with reading light. Available in leather and ecopelle. Headboard and bedside frame in ALPI® veneer (6 colors) or in satin lacquer (many colors available). Height: 119, 139 and 151 cm. Available in all bed sizes. Slats not included.Headboard in Canaletto walnut, upholstered in leather with 2 small flaps (on the left and on the right) in wood with lamp, outlet and wooden tray integrated in each flap. Padded bed frame upholstered in leather.Bed base and mattress not included.

beds.title: BACKSTAGE
beds.desc_top: Designed by Roberto Tapinassi and Maurizio Manzoni, the elegant Backstage stands out with its bold asymmetrical base, which is upholstered in leather. Another unique feature is the velvet headboard (also ...
beds.desc_fullView: Designed by Roberto Tapinassi and Maurizio Manzoni, the elegant Backstage stands out with its bold asymmetrical base, which is upholstered in leather. Another unique feature is the velvet headboard (also available in a lot of different fabrics) with edges in the same leather as the base. The vertical bands composing the sides of the headboard are articulated to create a more intimate alcove.

beds.title: MAH JONG
beds.desc_top: This bed features the same characteristics as Roche Bobois' iconic Mah Jong sofa. It has the same philosophy of living at ground level, but now the cushions are the headboard. The bed frame also resembles a ...
beds.desc_fullView: This bed features the same characteristics as Roche Bobois' iconic Mah Jong sofa. It has the same philosophy of living at ground level, but now the cushions are the headboard. The bed frame also resembles a huge cushion and exudes comfort. It is available in the entire range of fashion designer fabrics to make both subtle and bold creations.

beds.title: CHERCHE MIDI
beds.desc_top: Interior architect and designer Éric Gizard designed this large bed that would be fit for a palace suite. It features an opulent design and delicate details, such as the hand-stitched headboard.
beds.desc_fullView: Eric Gizard finds his inspiration in contemporary culture and the visual arts. A keen observer of international trends, it is not surprising that an aesthetic eclectism can be seen across his varied projects. Consistency reigns though in the form of simple shapes and a contemporary framework of lightness and fluidity. Trademark characteristics of his work are striking contrasts, clashing materials and colours, an emphasis on chiaroscuro and a harmonious fusion of tradition and modernity.
